Class ReportTestingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.testutils.ReportTestingUtils

  • public class ReportTestingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    various static methods and constants for the report testing infrastructure

    • Method Detail

      • runReportOn

        public static ImmutablePair<GroupReportData,java.lang.String> runReportOn(java.lang.String reportName,
                                                                          AmpReportModifier modifier,
                                                                          java.lang.String... activityNames)
        runs the report "reportName" from the database; the report will be presented a dummy WorkspaceFilter which will only allow amp_activity_id's which have their names equal to one specified
        Parameters:
        reportName - - the name of the report to run. Will run any if more with the same name exist in the database
        activitiyNames - - the names of the activities which should be presented to the report (through WorkspaceFilter). If null, WorkspaceFilter will not filter out any
        Returns:

      • getReportFilter

        public static AmpARFilter getReportFilter(AmpReports report)
        Retrieves the report filter
        Parameters:
        report -
        Returns:

      • loadReportByName

        public static AmpReports loadReportByName(java.lang.String reportName)
        loads a report with a given name. If multiple reports with the name exist, it is not defined which of them will be chosen. Given that this will only be run on a testcases database, it is ok
        Parameters:
        reportName -
        Returns:
